description: Enterprise techniques used by ComRAT, ATT&CK software S0126 v1.0
name: ComRAT (S0126)

techniques.comment: ComRAT samples have been seen which hijack COM objects for persistence by replacing the path to shell32.dll in registry location HKCU\Software\Classes\CLSID{42aedc87-2188-41fd-b9a3-0c966feabec1}\InprocServer32.
ComRAT has used HTTP requests for command and control.
